Geometry Template Library

1.0.1

Introduction

The goal of gtl is to provide a common interface for general geometry needs. Benefits are:

  • re-use the documentation
  • re-use unit tests
  • compare differents implementations
  • simplify algorithm exchanges

The reference implementation is based on c++ templates.

HELP HELP WANTED

Please contact me at: morgan dot leborgne at free.fr

Features

  • 2D, 3D, 4D vectors
  • 2D, 3D boxes
  • 3x3, 4x4 matrices
  • quaternion
  • complex
  • Ray, plane, spheres.
  • Intersection functions for all the geometry classes

Project page

The official project page is hosted at sourceforge

Daily Snapshot : geometry.zip

cvs -d:pserver:anonymous@gtl2.cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/gtl2 co geometry
